backend/main.mo: Main backend actor defining all data types (healthcare professionals, hospitals, vendors, NGOs, medical records, research projects, health records, medical tourism) and including authorization and blob storage mixins for access control and document management.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting the implementation of the Clean Claim Intelligence page with hero section, revenue loss factors, solution explanation, and 10-layer validation intelligence system with expandable UI components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Comprehensive summaries of all frontend files including routing, pages (Dashboard, Contact, Careers, Vendors, etc.), components (Chatbot, Navigation), hooks, and styling with Royal Teal color scheme and form styling details.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS configuration with OKLCH color system defining light and dark theme variables for backgrounds, foregrounds, borders, charts, and sidebar components using CSS custom properties.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with viewport meta tag, favicon reference, and root div mounting point for the React application titled 'AI Health Zon'.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main application router setup using TanStack Router with 20+ routes including Home, About, Solutions, Careers, Vendors, Clean Claim Intelligence, Admin Dashboard, and legal pages, wrapped with QueryClient and InternetIdentity providers.
frontend/src/components/Chatbot.tsx: Floating chatbot component with expandable interface, message history, typing indicator, and contextual responses about healthcare services, contact information, RCM, technology solutions, careers, vendors, ambulance, and NGOs with info@aihealthzon.com contact.
React form component using react-hook-form for demo booking requests with fields for name, hospital, designation, mobile, email, city, and message. Submits data via useSaveDemoBookingRequest hook and displays success/error toasts.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer component displaying AI Health Zon branding, contact email, social media links (Facebook, X, LinkedIn, Instagram), and navigation links organized in columns for Quick Links, Services, and Legal sections.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Root layout component that wraps the app with Navigation header, main content outlet, Footer, and WhatsAppButton in a flex column structure.
frontend/src/components/MemberDetailView: Dialog modal component displaying detailed member profiles for healthcare professionals, vendors, or NGOs with contact info, professional details, specialties/services, and action buttons for WhatsApp and email.
frontend/src/components/Navigation.tsx: Responsive navigation bar with logo, desktop/mobile menus, authentication button using Internet Identity, and active route highlighting across 11 main navigation links.
frontend/src/components/PendingRequestsL: List component that displays pending requests (professional, vendor, ambulance, or NGO) using RequestDetailCard components, with loading and empty states.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetup.tsx: Profile creation form allowing new users to set their name and account type (hospital, professional, vendor, or NGO) using the useSaveCallerUserProfile hook.
frontend/src/components/RequestDetailCar: Displays detailed information for registration requests (healthcare professionals, vendors, NGOs, ambulances) with expand/collapse functionality and approve/reject actions. Includes contact information display, document download links, and WhatsApp/email integration.
frontend/src/components/StakeholderDetai: Modal dialog component that shows comprehensive details for stakeholders (hospitals, vendors, NGOs) including contact information, services, and verification status. Provides quick actions for WhatsApp, email, and website links.
frontend/src/components/WhatsAppButton.t: Fixed floating button component that opens WhatsApp chat with a hardcoded phone number (918696766966) for customer support.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that manages the backend actor instance with authentication, creating authenticated or anonymous actors based on Internet Identity login state. Automatically invalidates and refetches dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context and hooks for login/logout functionality using DFINITY's AuthClient. Manages authentication state, identity persistence, and delegation validation.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Centralized collection of React Query hooks for all backend API calls including user profiles, admin checks, registration submissions, and CRUD operations for healthcare professionals, vendors, NGOs, and ambulances. Handles query invalidation and caching.
frontend/src/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for light/dark themes, enterprise color scheme (royal teal/white), and form styling. Includes responsive design utilities and overflow prevention for mobile devices.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React Query client and Internet Identity provider, then renders the root App component.
frontend/src/pages/AboutUs.tsx: About Us page displaying company mission, vision, values, and team information with a hero section, CTA buttons, and a demo booking modal. Includes responsive layout with cards showcasing organizational principles and leadership.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboard.tsx: Admin dashboard for reviewing and managing stakeholder registration requests (healthcare professionals, vendors, NGOs, ambulances). Displays pending request counts in tabs with access control requiring admin privileges.
frontend/src/pages/AmbulanceServices.tsx: Ambulance service registration page with a form collecting service details, contact information, and location with PIN code auto-lookup. Submits registration requests for admin approval.
frontend/src/pages/Blog.tsx: Empty blog page component with no content.
frontend/src/pages/BlogArticle.tsx: Empty blog article page component with no content.
frontend/src/pages/Careers.tsx: Careers page with a registration form for healthcare professionals to submit applications with CV upload, role selection, experience, and location details. Includes PIN code auto-lookup and upload progress tracking.
frontend/src/pages/CaseStudies.tsx: Case studies landing page with hero section and empty state indicating success stories are coming soon. Includes multiple CTAs for demo booking throughout the page.
frontend/src/pages/CleanClaimIntelligenc: Product page showcasing Clean Claim Intelligence solution with nine validation layers (patient eligibility, pre-authorization, clinical validity, coding integrity, billing controls, documentation, lifecycle intelligence, fraud analytics, and financial accuracy). Includes accordion UI and demo booking functionality.
frontend/src/pages/Contact.tsx: Contact page with hero section, contact information cards (phone, email, location), multiple CTAs for scheduling calls/demos, and a modal for demo booking form. Includes a chatbot component.
frontend/src/pages/HealthcareSupportSyst: Displays healthcare support categories (workforce, emergency, diagnostics, pharmacy, home healthcare, mental health, vendors, NGOs) with cards showing icons, images, descriptions, and services. Handles navigation to specific category pages or shows toast notifications.
frontend/src/pages/Home.tsx: Homepage with auto-rotating hero carousel, why-choose-us section with icons and benefits, solutions cards (RCM, technology, connecting platform), metrics display, and demo booking modal. Handles navigation with hash anchors.
frontend/src/pages/KnowledgeBoard.tsx: Knowledge board page focused on hospital licensing and regulatory compliance in India, featuring hero section, introduction with external research link, accordion sections for detailed information, and demo consultation booking modal.
frontend/src/pages/Members.tsx: Displays directory of approved network members (healthcare professionals, vendors, NGOs) in a grid layout with type badges, loading states, and member detail view modal. Fetches data using useGetAllApprovedMembers hook.
frontend/src/pages/NetworkDirectory.tsx: Displays a searchable and filterable directory of healthcare stakeholders (hospitals, vendors, NGOs) with a hero image header, filter controls, and a detail view modal for selected entities.
frontend/src/pages/NetworkMap.tsx: Shows a visual representation of the healthcare network with statistics (total stakeholders, cities covered) and a grid of location cards grouped by city, featuring a world map hero background.
frontend/src/pages/NgoListing.tsx: Provides an NGO registration form with PIN code-based auto-fill for location and displays a filterable list of approved NGOs with focus area and location filters.
frontend/src/pages/Onboarding.tsx: Presents a multi-phase onboarding guide for the healthcare revenue cycle (10 phases from patient registration to reporting), with navigation between phases and key points for each step.
frontend/src/pages/PatientJourney.tsx: A placeholder page for the upcoming Patient Journey Document Library feature, displaying a 'Coming Soon' message with a brief description.
frontend/src/pages/PrivacyPolicy.tsx: Displays the platform's privacy policy in a card layout, covering information collection, usage, sharing, security, user rights, and contact information.
frontend/src/pages/RefundPolicy.tsx: Displays a static refund policy page with sections on eligibility, request process, processing time, non-refundable items, and cancellations using Card components.
frontend/src/pages/Solutions.tsx: Presents RCM (Revenue Cycle Management) solutions with features, problem statements, impact metrics, FAQs, and a demo booking modal. Includes accordion and dialog components for interactive content.
frontend/src/pages/TermsConditions.tsx: Displays static terms and conditions page covering acceptance of terms, use of services, user responsibilities, intellectual property, liability limitations, and modifications.
frontend/src/pages/Vendors.tsx: Vendor registration page with form for submitting vendor details including auto-fill city/state from PIN code lookup, and displays list of existing vendors. Uses React Query hooks for data fetching and mutations.
frontend/src/utils/pinCodeLookup.ts: Utility function that validates and looks up Indian PIN codes using the India Post API to retrieve city and state information.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for extracting, storing, and managing URL parameters and sessionStorage, supporting both regular query strings and hash-based routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining custom colors (enterprise theme, royal colors), container settings, font families, animations, and plugins including typography and container queries.
project_state.json: Project state file defining the AI HEALTH ZON healthcare claim intelligence system website with multi-page structure and knowledge board. Tracks 10 existing features covering the clean claim intelligence product page with hero section, revenue loss factors, solution overview, 10-layer validation system, business outcomes, and call-to-action components.
